long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Email Notifier is an extension that gives you easy access to a few famous email providers (such as Gmail, iCloud, Live Mail, etc.), plus you get badge notifications.

Before using the extension, please log in to each email service once to enable the badge notifications. To add or remove an email service, please open the options page and choose desired services (at the top). Moreover, you can re-arrange email tiles within the toolbar popup. Badge color is also adjustable via the settings page.

To report bugs, please visit the addon's homepage and fill out the bug report form (https://mybrowseraddon.com/email-notifier.html).
